column4: hey, how can I make the ubuntu live usb when I don't have ubuntu (no, an dno windows)
unetbootin should be close to what is needed?
Do you have yaourt installed or access to auR.archlinux.org? They have a pkgbuild for unetbootin there.
It... won't see the stick? Can't you pick by device in /dev? Or nothing at all?
